q: Neues Museum. "I am doing something that I believe in and that should have been done a 100 years ago," Zahi Hawass told The Associated Press( Alert) in a telephone interview. My campaign has united those who have been pillaged against the pillagers. It's the world's greatest campaign of its kind and has inspired many nations to follow suit. Zahi Hawass , whose Indiana Jones hat has made him an instantly recognizable world figure, said his campaign has returned some 5,000 artifacts to Egypt from museums and private collections the world over since its launch in 2002.
